title: F/S T202 Hassan Ty Cobb & Jennings w/ Conlon Cobb SGC Graded
author: WillowGrove

posts.post_title: F/S T202 Hassan Ty Cobb & Jennings w/ Conlon Cobb SGC Graded
posts.post_content:
Nice looking SGC 40/3.  As you can see it has nice, sharp corners.  What's tough to see is the common issue many of these triple folders have and that is a crease down the middle.   It's there but it's kinda tough to see.

$595ppd.  Please email if interested.   [url]peterfish56@gmail.com[/url]   Thanks
